welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vancouver, Canada, a city known for its stunning natural beauty, diverse cultural scene, and vibrant atmosphere. We hope you enjoy exploring our charming city and all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coal Harbour Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Coal Harbour Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miners Bay Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Miners Bay Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's wifi network for free.
